releaseNotes:
• Hooray! Thanksgiving Day is coming to your island! Turkeys will soon come and help you celebrate the holiday, which will bring great rewards.
• Now your island will develop faster because you can produce exotic souvenirs!
• Make additional profits by hosting fun parties in hotels!
• Make your tourists happy by selling them exotic souvenirs in the Pavilion! Let them leave with the warmest memories of your island!
• Numerous technical and text improvements.
